casebody.data:
Jerry BENWARD, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. AUTOMOBILE INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 285. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 31, 1946.

Before AUGUSTUS N. HAND, CHASE, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Hill, Rivkins & Middleton, of New York City (Gregory S. Rivkins and Robert J. Andrews, both of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff-appellant. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (John M. Aherne, of New York City, of counsel), for defendant-ap-pellee. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on opinion of the District Court, 60 F.Supp. 995.
